name: 挑战不死之王
description:
Challenge the Undead King is an action Roguelike game. In the dungeons, many undead leaders are waiting for you to challenge. Only by constantly improving yourself can you be recognized by the king of the undead. Finding him and defeating him is your only choice.

The game provides multiple weapons, and each weapon provides different gifts.

Blessings include: ordinary skills, stunt skills, general attributes and exploration.
